No.51204) Sub:: Adoption of revised Integrity Pact (IP) for NHAI Projects- Regarding incorporation of names of IEMs in NITs. Guidelines on the subject Adoption of revised Integrity Pact   (IP) for NHAI Projects were circulated vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 5.8 dated 29.12.2020. Further, the following two Independent External Monitors (IEMs) have been engaged by NHAI: i_ Smt. Gauri Kumar, IAS (Retd.) {Reference Office Order No. 11019/2797/2021-Admn(E-76881)/870-Manual dated 17.05.2021(Annex-I)} ii_ Sh_ Ashish Bhauguna, IAS (Retd.) {Reference Office Order No_ 11019/2797/2021-Admn(E-76883/37312)/912-Manual dated 28.05.2021 (Annex-II)} 2 It was stipulated in the guidelines dated 29.12.2020 that the Independent External Monitor(IEM) would be, invariably, cited in the NITs. However, it has been observed that some Divisions/PIUs/ ROs engaged in purchase/ procurement in NHAl are not incorporating the names of IEMs in their bidding documents/ NITs. 3_ In view of   above, it is reiterated that all Divisions/ PIUs/ ROs engaged in purchase/ procurement in NHAI shall ensure strict compliance of the directions stipulated in the Guidelines dated 29.12.2020 and incorporate the names of IEMs, invariably, in the NITs. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
